a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Territorial vs. consumption-based COâ‚‚ emissions per capita
Consumption-based emissions are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. They are territorial
emissions minus emissions embedded in exports, plus emissions embedded in imports.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2024); Population based on various sources (2024)
